data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The bitrate and user limit reset when changing display orientation
data.expected_result: The bitrate and user limit shouldn't reset when changing display orientation
data.short_description: Changing display orientation when editing a voice channel's settings resets bitrate and user limit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a voice channel that you have the "Manage Channels" permission for - Modify the bitrate and user limit by dragging the sliders to the left/right - Switch to landscape mode (or to portrait mode if you are in landscape) - Notice that the bitrate and user limit were reset
